article: the u.s. military said monday it had launched a joint drive with iraqi forces into a dangerous sunni neighborhood in north baghdad , a region that has seen significant violence in the sectarian warfare shaking the capital .
abstract: military announces joint operation with iraqi forces in dangerous north baghdad neighborhood
